typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Dates as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss',
		Category as string,
		Descript as string,
		DayOfWeek as string,
		PdDistrict as string,
		Resolution as string,
		Address as string,
		X as double,
		Y as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrigenDatos
OrigenDatos derive(Suma = X+Y) ~> ColumnaSuma
ColumnaSuma derive(Category = lower(Category)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['datosProcesados.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> destino
